NAME: Name
COLOR: Color of the divider in RGB format
LONG_TEXT: It can be either solid, dashed or dotted. Select your style. It's up to you.
SET_LINE_HEIGHT: Set the line height. Use value in pixels(px).
CLON: Bu alanın tüm kayıtlı ayarlarını koruyarak klonlaması yapılır.
SUB_SHARE: Direct form link and social share
SUB_DIRECT: Your form is securely published and ready to use at this address.
SUB_SSHARE: Share a direct link to your form via email.
SUB_SCHEDULE: Send periodic emails to remind people to fill out your form.
TITLE: Header
SUB_TITLE: Enter a short and descriptive name for this form.
SUB_FORM_STAT: You can deactivate your form right now, on a specific date, or when it reaches a specific number of form responses.
NO_ITEM1: There are no items in this form.
NO_ITEM2: Add a new item to this form from left bar.
WELCOME_DESCRIPTION: Please login to start creating forms quickly and easily.
CREATE_DESCRIPTION: Create the form you want easily and comfortably.
PUBLISH_DESCRIPTION: Share the form you created the way you want.
ADDRESSTEXT: ESOGÜ Meşelik Campus ETGB Osmangazi Technopark No: 59/102 Odunpazarı / ESKİŞEHİR
UGp1: Press the + button on the left to start creating the form.
UGp2: Click on the element you want to add to your form.
UGp3: The form elements you add will create such a form in front of you.
UGp4: You can reach the editing menu of your form by clicking the upper right button, and you can remove the element you added by clicking the lower right button.
UGp5: You can edit the form elements you add as you wish.
UGp6: You can delete all the elements in your form by clicking the Clear button.
UGp7: You can change the name of your form and see the time of the last changes.
UGp8: You can create your form by clicking the create button, and you can go to the sharing section by clicking the publish button.
UGp9: From the Form Settings section, you can add descriptions to your forms, and enable - disable settings.
UGp10: You can share your form via direct link, e-mail, download as pdf.
SHOW_FORM: Your forms will be displayed here.
MERGEN: MERGEN, in Altai mythology, means the one who holds the knowledge and dominates the knowledge.
